abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton criticized former Gov. Mike Huckabee of Arkansas over remarks he made about the Obama administration’s and others’ agreement with Iran to curtail its nuclear program.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Assails Mike Huckabee’s Remarks on Iran Nuclear Deal

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton criticized former Gov. Mike Huckabee of Arkansas over remarks he made about the Obama administration’s and others’ agreement with Iran to curtail its nuclear program.
